Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vPACAdjCostIssue' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vPACAdjCostIssue] GO CREATE VIEW vPACAdjCostIssue AS select cost.CompanyID, cost.FinPeriodID, i.ItemClassID, isnull(cost.TranCost,0) as FinPtdCostIssued, cost.BaseQty as FinPtdQtyIssued, hist.PACUnitCost as PACUnitCost, cost.InventoryID as InventoryID, (cost.BaseQty * hist.PACUnitCost) as PACIssueCost, (s.SiteID) as SiteID, (isnull(cost.TranCost,0) - (cost.BaseQty * hist.PACUnitCost)) as IssueAdjAmount, cost.ReasonCode, cost.RefNbr, cost.LineNbr from INTran cost inner join lumpacunitcosthistory hist on cost.FinPeriodID = hist.FinperiodID and cost.InventoryID = hist.InventoryID and cost.CompanyID = hist.CompanyID left join INSite s on cost.CompanyID = s.CompanyID and cost.SiteID = s.SiteID inner join InventoryItem i on cost.CompanyID = i.CompanyID and cost.InventoryID = i.InventoryID where cost.DocType not in ('R','T','A','P','D') and cost.ReasonCode is not null and NULLIF(cost.SOOrderNbr,'') is null and NULLIF(cost.POReceiptNbr,'') is null and NULLIF(cost.AMProdOrdID,'') is null
